attributes.action: Give Prof Scraton a Knighthood for his fight for truth and justice
attributes.additional_details: Prof Phil Scraton instrumental and so determined to get to the truth against all the odds. Without him the potential for possible justice in the Hillsborough case is not there.
attributes.background: Prof Phil Scraton showed great determination in getting to the truth of what happened with the redaction of the South Yorkshire Police officers statements, amongst other things. Without this work the Hillsborough Independent panel would not have found the evidence for the new inquiry. JFT96.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
